ygData.subject: Re: Enchanters vs Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From:  To:  Sent: January 12, 2000 01:07 Subject: Re: [eqbards] Enchanters vs Bards ... Also they seem to be
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: <silky@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: January 12, 2000 01:07
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Enchanters vs Bards


> From: silky@...
> I play both a bard - and an enchanter. The two classes are amazingly
> similar in what they can pull off.
>
> They are also the two hardest classes to play WELL.

Also they seem to be the easiest classes to play badly. :) I was soloing my
monk in Highpass last night (managed to get a Shralok Pack!) and there was a
group there, with a bard. This bard was possibly the worst one I've ever
seen. She played Bellow during fights. That was IT most of the time,
except when she played Lullaby. When there was only one mob. I rarely even
saw Hymn being played between fights. Her group had mostly meleers as well.
During the couple hours I was there soloing, I seemed to get an awful lot of
kills. I'm almost glad she didn't know what she was doing, because they
could have prevented me from getting any, if she was capable. :) I'm not an
expert, but it still made me wince.

-Gaelaian Galaenor, bard of the perpetual 22nd, Tunare.
-Raean Bloodyhands, monk of the 23rd pummelling, Tunare.
